# Do any of you use auto-feeders for your pets?

[@Kathleen](@GSuGLzJa8t3aJCLvs66Ekn7MXdr3yqCSzsd6z2iUEBY=.ed25519) feeds the cats in the morning and I feed them at night, but we often notice one of two things happening:

- Jerome steals a bunch of Sunshine's food
- Jerome is cranky and whiney and attacks Sunshine

We're trying to avoid letting him get too chunky or aggressive, and I'm wondering whether our feeding schedule isn't working for cats who seem to enjoy grazing throughout the day. I'm very skeptical of Silicon Valley solutions to silly or simple problems, but I'm wondering whether an auto-feeder would help here (or whether Jerome would eat it all).

Anyone have experience with this sort of thing? Bonus points for a DIY project.

#cats #diy
